subject: Re: First Files from my new Frank's box #29
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
Yeah, that was another design change, get the sound chamber out of 
the main cabinet, just that almost eliminates the feed back problem. 
Of course, from work with the ghostman, or direct mode, I've found 
the sound chamber is definately not needed, and may do more harm, by 
introducing distortion, than good. 

 Frank-S

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Steve Hultay" <urkel23@...> wrote:
>
>

research.

did

opposed 
> to the other boxes out there.  It appeared in the picture that the 
> echo box was on the outside of the box, which seems to make more 
> sense in making louder volume and less feedback.  Are you 
> incorporating that in future boxes as well, the voices also sounded 
> clearer.
> 
> -Steve H.
